message: Ali ima gmail možnost, ko nekdo pošlje na moj gmail sporočilo, le-ta sam odgovori z vnaprej nastavljenim sporočilo. Npr. Sem na dopustu...

Za take in podobne primere ima Gmail, "Vacation" funkcijo. On your computer, open Gmail. In the top right, click Settings Settings and then Settings. Scroll down to the "Vacation responder" section. Select Vacation responder on. Fill in the date range, subject, and message. Under your message, check the box if you only want your contacts to see your vacation reply. At the bottom of the page, click Save Changes.
